# DJI Air 3 - Specs | DJI

## Online Customer Service
Support center and chat links.

## Specifications
| Item | Details |
| --- | --- |
| Max Flight Time | 46 minutes |
| Max Speed | 21 m/s |
| Image Sensor | 1/1.3-inch CMOS |
| Effective Pixels | 48 MP |
| Obstacle Sensing | Forward/Backward: 0.6-30 m |

## Camera
- Video Transmission: DJI O4
- Max Service Ceiling: 6000 m
